{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Outlet Supervisor",
  "description": "So Fresh is Nigeria&#39;s pioneer and number one healthy food chain, providing fresh, delicious, nutrient-rich healthy meals and committed to promoting a healthy lifestyle.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Outlet Supervisor
Job Location:&nbsp;Opic, Isheri Estate - Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are currently recruiting Outlet Supervisors for our OPIC outlet. So Fresh is a healthy food company with outlets across Nigeria. At So Fresh, we believe food should be fresh and close to nature as much as possible, hence we create tasty, fresh, delicious healthy food options.
	To provide leadership to the team members by overseeing the operations and management of the outlet daily with the aim to maximize profit while minimizing cost.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND, HND and B.Sc Degree
	3 &ndash; 5 years of experience in the food/retail industry
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in a supervisory role in the food/retail industry
	Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced work environment.
	Excellent record keeping and supervisory skills.
	Candidate should live close to the desired location: OPIC Isheri, Ogun State.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 per month.&nbsp;

Benefits:


	Annual leave and Allowance
	Health Insurance
	Pension contribution.
",

Outlet Supervisor Job at So Fresh




        
    

        
        So Fresh is Nigeria's pioneer and number one healthy food chain, providing fresh, delicious, nutrient-rich healthy meals and committed to promoting a healthy lifestyle.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Outlet Supervisor
Job Location: Opic, Isheri Estate - Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are currently recruiting Outlet Supervisors for our OPIC outlet. So Fresh is a healthy food company with outlets across Nigeria. At So Fresh, we believe food should be fresh and close to nature as much as possible, hence we create tasty, fresh, delicious healthy food options.
	To provide leadership to the team members by overseeing the operations and management of the outlet daily with the aim to maximize profit while minimizing cost.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND, HND and B.Sc Degree
	3 – 5 years of experience in the food/retail industry
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in a supervisory role in the food/retail industry
	Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced work environment.
	Excellent record keeping and supervisory skills.
	Candidate should live close to the desired location: OPIC Isheri, Ogun State.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 per month. 

Benefits:


	Annual leave and Allowance
	Health Insurance
	Pension contribution.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administrative Assistant",
  "description": "Noble Hall Leadership Academy for Girls is a day and boarding secondary school for girls between the ages of 10 and 16. We provide a world-class holistic education, developing leaders of tomorrow.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: Registrar
Start Date: Immediate

Job Description


	We are seeking a highly organised, proactive, and dedicated Administrative Assistant to join our team and support the smooth running of school operations.


Key Responsibilities
The Administrative Assistant will provide essential clerical and operational support to the Registrar&rsquo;s office and the wider school. Responsibilities include:


	Front-desk reception duties: welcoming visitors, attending to phone calls and enquiries.
	Managing official correspondence, emails, notices, and document dispatch.
	Maintaining filing systems, student records, and ensuring accurate documentation.
	Supporting registration, admissions, and academic records processes.
	Assisting with data entry, attendance updates, and school database tasks.
	Coordinating meetings, preparing minutes, and supporting school events.
	Managing office supplies and ensuring administrative materials are available.
	Providing general administrative support to the Registrar as required.
	Upholding the school&rsquo;s professional image, service standards, and confidentiality.


Requirements


	OND / HND / Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administration, Management, Secretarial Studies, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in an administrative or front-desk role (preferably in an educational institution).
	Strong written and verbal communication skills.
	Excellent organisational and time-management abilities.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Ability to maintain confidentiality and work professionally and maturely.
	Friendly, courteous, and committed to high-quality service.
	Female candidates are strongly encouraged to apply.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;vacancy.@noblehall.com&nbsp;using &quot;Application &ndash; Administrative Assistant&quot; as the subject of the email.

Note


	Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
	Join us and help support a learning environment where girls thrive, lead, and excel.

Administrative Assistant Job at Noble Hall Leadership Academy for Girls




        
    

        
        Noble Hall Leadership Academy for Girls is a day and boarding secondary school for girls between the ages of 10 and 16. We provide a world-class holistic education, developing leaders of tomorrow.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: Registrar
Start Date: Immediate

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly organised, proactive, and dedicated Administrative Assistant to join our team and support the smooth running of school operations.


Key Responsibilities
The Administrative Assistant will provide essential clerical and operational support to the Registrar’s office and the wider school. Responsibilities include:


	Front-desk reception duties: welcoming visitors, attending to phone calls and enquiries.
	Managing official correspondence, emails, notices, and document dispatch.
	Maintaining filing systems, student records, and ensuring accurate documentation.
	Supporting registration, admissions, and academic records processes.
	Assisting with data entry, attendance updates, and school database tasks.
	Coordinating meetings, preparing minutes, and supporting school events.
	Managing office supplies and ensuring administrative materials are available.
	Providing general administrative support to the Registrar as required.
	Upholding the school’s professional image, service standards, and confidentiality.


Requirements


	OND / HND / Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Management, Secretarial Studies, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience in an administrative or front-desk role (preferably in an educational institution).
	Strong written and verbal communication skills.
	Excellent organisational and time-management abilities.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Ability to maintain confidentiality and work professionally and maturely.
	Friendly, courteous, and committed to high-quality service.
	Female candidates are strongly encouraged to apply.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and Cover Letter to: vacancy.@noblehall.com using "Application – Administrative Assistant" as the subject of the email.

Note


	Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
	Join us and help support a learning environment where girls thrive, lead, and excel.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Flutter / Dart Mobile Developer",
  "description": "Expedier is a digital financial platform on a mission to empower underserved individuals and businesses.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Flutter / Dart Mobile Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Remote

Job Summary


	We are looking for a talented and experienced Flutter/Dart Mobile Developer to join our dynamic team.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong background in mobile app development using Flutter and Dart, with a passion for creating high-quality, user-friendly applications.
	As a Flutter/Dart Mobile Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our mobile applications while working closely with our cross-functional team to deliver exceptional user experiences.


Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain high-quality mobile applications using Flutter and Dart.
	Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to define app requirements and user stories.
	Create visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces that adhere to design guidelines.
	Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while following best practices and coding standards.
	Perform thorough testing and debugging to ensure app functionality and performance.
	Integrate with backend services, APIs, and third-party libraries as needed.
	Stay up-to-date with Flutter and Dart developments and ensure the use of the latest features and libraries.
	Optimize app performance, responsiveness, and user experience.
	Troubleshoot and resolve app defects and issues in a timely manner.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define technical requirements and project timelines.
	Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and promote knowledge sharing.
	Provide mentorship and guidance to junior developers as needed.


Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
	Proven experience in mobile app development using Flutter and Dart, with a strong portfolio of completed projects.
	Proficiency in Flutter/Dart best practices and design patterns.
	Strong understanding of the Flutter ecosystem, including state management, navigation, and widget libraries.
	Experience with RESTful APIs, third-party integrations, and Firebase services.
	Solid knowledge of mobile app architecture and design principles.
	Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative development workflows.
	Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
	Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.
	Ability to adapt to changing project requirements and priorities.
	Experience with native Android or iOS development is a plus.
	Knowledge of app deployment and distribution processes (App Store, Google Play) is a plus.


Salary
N450,000 - N550,000 monthly.&nbsp;

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their cover letter and resume to:&nbsp;hr@expedier.co&nbsp;using the Job Position as the Subject of the mail.",

Flutter / Dart Mobile Developer Job at Expedier




        
    

        
        Expedier is a digital financial platform on a mission to empower underserved individuals and businesses.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Flutter / Dart Mobile Developer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Mode: Remote

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a talented and experienced Flutter/Dart Mobile Developer to join our dynamic team.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong background in mobile app development using Flutter and Dart, with a passion for creating high-quality, user-friendly applications.
	As a Flutter/Dart Mobile Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our mobile applications while working closely with our cross-functional team to deliver exceptional user experiences.


Responsibilities


	Develop and maintain high-quality mobile applications using Flutter and Dart.
	Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to define app requirements and user stories.
	Create visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces that adhere to design guidelines.
	Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code while following best practices and coding standards.
	Perform thorough testing and debugging to ensure app functionality and performance.
	Integrate with backend services, APIs, and third-party libraries as needed.
	Stay up-to-date with Flutter and Dart developments and ensure the use of the latest features and libraries.
	Optimize app performance, responsiveness, and user experience.
	Troubleshoot and resolve app defects and issues in a timely manner.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define technical requirements and project timelines.
	Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and promote knowledge sharing.
	Provide mentorship and guidance to junior developers as needed.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
	Proven experience in mobile app development using Flutter and Dart, with a strong portfolio of completed projects.
	Proficiency in Flutter/Dart best practices and design patterns.
	Strong understanding of the Flutter ecosystem, including state management, navigation, and widget libraries.
	Experience with RESTful APIs, third-party integrations, and Firebase services.
	Solid knowledge of mobile app architecture and design principles.
	Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative development workflows.
	Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
	Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.
	Ability to adapt to changing project requirements and priorities.
	Experience with native Android or iOS development is a plus.
	Knowledge of app deployment and distribution processes (App Store, Google Play) is a plus.


Salary
N450,000 - N550,000 monthly. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their cover letter and resume to: hr@expedier.co using the Job Position as the Subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

  "description": "Cobranet Limited; a reputable organization incorporated in 2003 and provides internet solutions. Our footprint and range of products have grown immensely since incorporation and we are proud to provide every segment of society with a reliable link to the digital universe.

Our entire network topology is rugged, dynamic and fully redundant with negligible downtimes: content showing extremely high availability exceeding 99.5%. Our promise is to continue providing innovative solutions at the best feature-to-price and service-to-price ratio.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing and Communication Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	A Marketing and Communications job description involves developing and executing Communication and Marketing strategies to promote a company&#39;s brand, products, or services.
	Key responsibilities include creating content for various channels, managing social media, analyzing campaign performance, and collaborating with other teams.
	This role requires strong writing, creative, and analytical skills to ensure consistent messaging and engagement with the target audience.


Key Responsibilities


	Strategy development:Create and implement comprehensive marketing and communications plans that align with business goals.
	Content creation:Produce compelling content for a range of platforms, including websites, social media, email, video, and print.
	Campaign management:Plan, execute, and optimize marketing campaigns, including paid search and social media advertising.
	Social media management:Manage and maintain the company&#39;s social media accounts and content.
	Performance analysis:Track and analyze key metrics to measure the effectiveness of campaigns and identify areas for improvement.
	Cross-functional collaboration:Work closely with other departments, such as sales, product management, and creative teams.
	Market research:Conduct market research to understand audience preferences and competitor activities.
	Brand consistency:Ensure consistent messaging and brand standards across all communications.


Required skills and qualifications


	Minimum of a Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree or its equivalent in Marketing, Mass Communication or any related course.
	Minimum of 5 years of Cognate Experience as a Marketing and Communication Officer is a MUST. Experience in an ISP is an added advantage.
	Excellent communication skills:Strong written, verbal, and visual communication abilities, with meticulous attention to detail and proofreading skills.
	Creative and strategic thinking:Ability to develop creative content and strategic plans.
	Analytical skills:Experience with data analysis to track performance and optimize campaigns.
	Technical proficiency:Familiarity with social media platforms, content management systems (like WordPress), and analytics tools (like Google Analytics) is often required.
	Project management:Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.
	Team player:Ability to collaborate effectively with internal and external stakeholders.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and&nbsp;qualified&nbsp;candidates should send their CV&nbsp;to:&nbsp;recruitment@cobranet.ng&nbsp;using &quot;Marketing and Commuication Officer&quot; as the subject of the mail.

Note:&nbsp;Only qualified candidates will be shortlisted.&nbsp;",

Marketing and Communication Officer Job at Cobranet Limited




        
    

        
        Cobranet Limited; a reputable organization incorporated in 2003 and provides internet solutions. Our footprint and range of products have grown immensely since incorporation and we are proud to provide every segment of society with a reliable link to the digital universe.

Our entire network topology is rugged, dynamic and fully redundant with negligible downtimes: content showing extremely high availability exceeding 99.5%. Our promise is to continue providing innovative solutions at the best feature-to-price and service-to-price ratio.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing and Communication Officer

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Description


	A Marketing and Communications job description involves developing and executing Communication and Marketing strategies to promote a company's brand, products, or services.
	Key responsibilities include creating content for various channels, managing social media, analyzing campaign performance, and collaborating with other teams.
	This role requires strong writing, creative, and analytical skills to ensure consistent messaging and engagement with the target audience.


Key Responsibilities


	Strategy development:Create and implement comprehensive marketing and communications plans that align with business goals.
	Content creation:Produce compelling content for a range of platforms, including websites, social media, email, video, and print.
	Campaign management:Plan, execute, and optimize marketing campaigns, including paid search and social media advertising.
	Social media management:Manage and maintain the company's social media accounts and content.
	Performance analysis:Track and analyze key metrics to measure the effectiveness of campaigns and identify areas for improvement.
	Cross-functional collaboration:Work closely with other departments, such as sales, product management, and creative teams.
	Market research:Conduct market research to understand audience preferences and competitor activities.
	Brand consistency:Ensure consistent messaging and brand standards across all communications.


Required skills and qualifications


	Minimum of a Bachelor’s Degree or its equivalent in Marketing, Mass Communication or any related course.
	Minimum of 5 years of Cognate Experience as a Marketing and Communication Officer is a MUST. Experience in an ISP is an added advantage.
	Excellent communication skills:Strong written, verbal, and visual communication abilities, with meticulous attention to detail and proofreading skills.
	Creative and strategic thinking:Ability to develop creative content and strategic plans.
	Analytical skills:Experience with data analysis to track performance and optimize campaigns.
	Technical proficiency:Familiarity with social media platforms, content management systems (like WordPress), and analytics tools (like Google Analytics) is often required.
	Project management:Ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.
	Team player:Ability to collaborate effectively with internal and external stakeholders.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@cobranet.ng using "Marketing and Commuication Officer" as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only qualified candidates will be shortlisted.     

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Digital Marketing Specialist",
  "description": "Havana Group has several companies in its portfolio. You will enjoy working with us if you&#39;re a talented, young, vibrant, energetic, creative, and ambitious individual who wants to work with a team of other champions, in an environment that sponsors growth and development. If you&#39;re not intimidated by greatness, you&#39;re welcome to join our team.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Specialist&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Enugu&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Are you a results-driven email marketing professional with a passion for crafting campaigns that convert?
	As an Expert Email Marketer, you&rsquo;ll play a key role in driving lead generation, nurturing client relationships, and scaling marketing performance through cold email outreach, bulk campaigns, and targeted automation sequences.


Responsibilities


	Planning, creating, and executing cold email outreach and bulk email marketing campaigns for different audiences and goals
	Writing compelling copy that drives clicks, engagement, and conversions
	Managing and optimising email automation flows and sequences
	Segmenting audiences for targeted communication and improved results
	Tracking and analysing campaign performance metrics (open rates, CTRs, conversions, etc.)
	Conducting A/B tests and using insights to improve campaign effectiveness
	Collaborating with sales and content teams to ensure consistent messaging across channels
	Ensuring compliance with email regulations and deliverability best practices


Requirements


	Proven experience in email marketing and cold outreach (preferably in B2B or digital marketing environments)
	Strong understanding of email automation and outreach tools (e.g., HubSpot, Instantly, Mailchimp, Lemlist, ActiveCampaign, etc.)
	Excellent copywriting and storytelling skills
	Data-driven mindset with the ability to interpret and act on metrics
	Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and able to work independently in a remote setting


Salary
N150,000 - N250,000 Monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr.9figuremedia@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",

  },

Digital Marketing Specialist Job at Havana Group




        
    

        
        Havana Group has several companies in its portfolio. You will enjoy working with us if you're a talented, young, vibrant, energetic, creative, and ambitious individual who wants to work with a team of other champions, in an environment that sponsors growth and development. If you're not intimidated by greatness, you're welcome to join our team.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketing Specialist 

Job Location: Enugu 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Are you a results-driven email marketing professional with a passion for crafting campaigns that convert?
	As an Expert Email Marketer, you’ll play a key role in driving lead generation, nurturing client relationships, and scaling marketing performance through cold email outreach, bulk campaigns, and targeted automation sequences.


Responsibilities


	Planning, creating, and executing cold email outreach and bulk email marketing campaigns for different audiences and goals
	Writing compelling copy that drives clicks, engagement, and conversions
	Managing and optimising email automation flows and sequences
	Segmenting audiences for targeted communication and improved results
	Tracking and analysing campaign performance metrics (open rates, CTRs, conversions, etc.)
	Conducting A/B tests and using insights to improve campaign effectiveness
	Collaborating with sales and content teams to ensure consistent messaging across channels
	Ensuring compliance with email regulations and deliverability best practices


Requirements


	Proven experience in email marketing and cold outreach (preferably in B2B or digital marketing environments)
	Strong understanding of email automation and outreach tools (e.g., HubSpot, Instantly, Mailchimp, Lemlist, ActiveCampaign, etc.)
	Excellent copywriting and storytelling skills
	Data-driven mindset with the ability to interpret and act on metrics
	Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and able to work independently in a remote setting


Salary
N150,000 - N250,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
